subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Frost}}
{{ja-kanjitab|しも|yomi=k}} {{IPAchar|/simo/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɕimo/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=しも|-}}, first attested in the ''{{w|Nihon Shoki}}'' (720 {{CE}}). Thought to be cognate with or derived from {{m|ja|下|tr={{IPAfont|⟨simo1⟩}} → shimo||[[bottom]], [[lower]] [[part]]}}.

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|霜を置く|しも を おく}}

subSections.title: Proverbs
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|霜を履んで堅氷%至る|しも を ふんで けんぴょう% いたる}}
